name: Han la Poutré
content: Han La Poutré HAN LA POUTRÉ Personal Home Page Contact information: Email: Han.La.Poutre@cwi.nl Tel.: 020 - 592 4082 (CWI) There also is a corporate personal CWI information page. General information: Research: Han La Poutré works in the area of multi-agent systems, smart energy systems, agent-based energy markets, and computational intelligence. His research is multi-disciplinary, involving computer science in cooperation with electrical engineering and economics. Affiliations: CWI (the national research center for mathematics and computer science in the Netherlands). Senior researcher in the research group Intelligent and Autonomous Systems . Manager Research and Strategy at CWI Delft University of Technology (TU Delft) Full professor of Intelligent Energy Systems at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, and Computer Science, Department of Electrical Sustainable Energy (ESE), (employed for one day a week). Editorial Boards / Steering Committees / Programme Committees / Advisory Committees / Directorates / Management: (some current and former memberships and activities) Scientific Director of the International Strategic Cooperation Inria - CWI Vice president of ERCIM (the European Research Consortium for Informatics and Mathematics). Leader of the Strategy Task Group of ERCIM (the European Research Consortium for Informatics and Mathematics). Member of the Board of IPN (ICT Research Platform Nederland). Member of the Board of the AI, Media and Democracy Lab (AIMD). Member of the Sounding Board of the knowledge line "Digital Constitutional State" ("Digitale Rechtsstaat") of the Scientific Research and Documentation Centre (WODC) of the Dutch Ministry of Justice and Security. Co-chair of the Energy Division of the research and innovation program on data: Commit2Data. Chair of the program supervisory committee Uncertainty Reduction in Smart Energy Systems (URSES) of NWO. Chair of the program supervisory committee Energy System Integration (ESI) of NWO. Member of the EASAC working group on Decarbonisation of Transport (EASAC: European Academies - Science Advisory Council) Member of the program supervisory committee Smart Energy Systems (SES) of NWO. Member of the editorial board of Netnomics (internet technology and economics) (Kluwer); Member of the Senior Programme Committee of AAMAS 2015, 2016, 2018, and 2019 (AAMAS: Int. Conf. on Autonomous Agents and Multi-Agent Systems) Former Chair of the IEEE Computational Finance and Economics Technical Committee (IEEE CFE TC) (IEEE's Computational Intelligence Society (CIS)); Former Chair of the BNVKI (Belgium-Netherlands Association for Artificial Intelligence). Former member of the Scientific Directorate of Schloss Dagstuhl, Germany; Former member of core team Smart Energy Systems of EIT Digital Former member of the Management Team of CWI (during 10+ years). Founder and former group leader of the Intelligent and Autonomous Systems research group of CWI (during 18+ years). Former member of the former Program Advisory Committee (PMJ) of the Scientific Research and Documentation Centre (WODC) of the Dutch Ministry of Security and Justice. Degrees: Master's degree in Mathematics from Eindhoven University of Technology, and Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Utrecht University. Former affiliations and awards Princeton University; Utrecht University; Leiden University, and Eindhoven University of Technology. STOC Award for Best PhD-Paper (ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing); NATO Science Fellowship; KNAW Fellowship (Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences). Publications: See the list of publications. CWI DISCLAIMER
